title: DigitalMonk
author: DigitalMonk
content: Hello everyone, I am planning to build a sophisticated Bitcoin Explorer which will benefit every one trading Bitcoin. I need your help to complete my project. Once you help me, I will give a good reward in exchange of your works. You won't be unhappy because I am a Digital Monk. You will get a surPrize when you will know me.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: If you want to build it from scratch you need to learn more about blockchain start with how to build your own blockchain and then explorer. Check these sources below to expand your development knowledge about the Bitcoin blockchain. - https://github.com/openblockchains/awesome-blockchainsThen check this for some open-source blockchain explorer under Bitcoin.- https://github.com/yjjnls/awesome-blockchainOr this one below.- https://github.com/bitquery/explorer

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 30, 2022, 11:10:04 PMBitcoin Explorer which will benefit every one trading Bitcoin.Could you start by explaining how does a bitcoin [block] explorer have any benefit for those who are trading bitcoin on exchanges?

comments.author: DigitalMonk
comments.body: Quote from: pooya87 on August 31, 2022, 02:49:49 AMQuote from: DigitalMonk on August 30, 2022, 11:10:04 PMBitcoin Explorer which will benefit every one trading Bitcoin.Could you start by explaining how does a bitcoin [block] explorer have any benefit for those who are trading bitcoin on exchanges?Bitcoin Explorer is the window of the Bitcoin Blockchain. There are numbers of Bitcoin Explorer are there for people find information about Bitcoin Blocks and transaction. I want to build a New Kind of Block Explorer where each Bitcoin trader will find an opportunity to trade Bitcoin Over the Counter. Normally traders need to reveal their personal information when trading through an exchange. I will be mechaising complete anonymous Bitcoin transaction for traders and investors with a new Transaction Protocol based API which will eliminate the third party like the Exchange and conduction all the transaction P2P. If you like to help me and want to help me please contact me then I will explain details.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 31, 2022, 07:26:50 AMQuote from: pooya87 on August 31, 2022, 02:49:49 AMCould you start by explaining how does a bitcoin [block] explorer have any benefit for those who are trading bitcoin on exchanges?Bitcoin Explorer is the window of the Bitcoin Blockchain. There are numbers of Bitcoin Explorer are there for people find information about Bitcoin Blocks and transaction. I want to build a New Kind of Block Explorer where each Bitcoin trader will find an opportunity to trade Bitcoin Over the Counter. Normally traders need to reveal their personal information when trading through an exchange. I will be mechaising complete anonymous Bitcoin transaction for traders and investors with a new Transaction Protocol based API which will eliminate the third party like the Exchange and conduction all the transaction P2P. If you like to help me and want to help me please contact me then I will explain details. From what I see you seem to have misunderstood/mixed up what blockchain explorer means, what a DEX is and how OTC works and want to invent something that is either already existing, either cannot be done in the way you're imagining it (i.e. I think that the trades will be either P2P, either OTC, but not both).

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 31, 2022, 07:26:50 AMQuote from: pooya87 on August 31, 2022, 02:49:49 AMQuote from: DigitalMonk on August 30, 2022, 11:10:04 PMBitcoin Explorer which will benefit every one trading Bitcoin.Could you start by explaining how does a bitcoin [block] explorer have any benefit for those who are trading bitcoin on exchanges?Bitcoin Explorer is the window of the Bitcoin Blockchain. There are numbers of Bitcoin Explorer are there for people find information about Bitcoin Blocks and transaction. I want to build a New Kind of Block Explorer where each Bitcoin trader will find an opportunity to trade Bitcoin Over the Counter. Normally traders need to reveal their personal information when trading through an exchange. I will be mechaising complete anonymous Bitcoin transaction for traders and investors with a new Transaction Protocol based API which will eliminate the third party like the Exchange and conduction all the transaction P2P. So, you basically want to build a DEX? We already have a few of these, but hey, the more the merrier. Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 31, 2022, 07:26:50 AMIf you like to help me and want to help me please contact me then I will explain details. Help you with what? I'm pretty sure you have no idea what you're talking about nor do you have any programming skills or experience. So you need a full stack developer, and such things cost money. To motivate someone to invest their expertise and time in your project, you need to offer something in return. What are you offering?

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Does anyone think the OP is serious? Just ten days ago he was asking questions like this - and today he wants some kind of magical Bitcoin explorer  What's next? Designing digital good fairies to fly around handing out free Bitcoins to people?

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on August 31, 2022, 10:57:52 AMDoes anyone think the OP is serious? Just ten days ago he was asking questions like this - and today he wants some kind of magical Bitcoin explorer  What's next? Designing digital good fairies to fly around handing out free Bitcoins to people?I am still to decide if he's trolling or it's just a completely confused kid who wants to make a crypto business (i.e. earn money) without any correct knowledge about bitcoin whatsoever and without a basic understanding on how to run a business (have a clear idea, discuss with professionals whether it can be done or not, acknowledge that people must be paid for their effort).

comments.author: ABCbits
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 31, 2022, 07:26:50 AMI want to build a New Kind of Block Explorer where each Bitcoin trader will find an opportunity to trade Bitcoin Over the Counter. Normally traders need to reveal their personal information when trading through an exchange.It's not called block explorer. People usually would give label P2P or DEX.Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 31, 2022, 07:26:50 AMI will be mechaising complete anonymous Bitcoin transaction for traders and investors with a new Transaction Protocol based API which will eliminate the third party like the Exchange and conduction all the transaction P2P. New transaction protocol? Will you use soft fork or hard fork to activte such protocol on Bitcoin network? Could you share technical detail of your "new transaction protocol"?Quote from: Lucius on August 31, 2022, 10:57:52 AMDoes anyone think the OP is serious?Probably no. But if OP fail to answer serious question, people who don't know about his history would question how serious/capable he is.

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on August 31, 2022, 11:15:35 AMQuote from: Lucius on August 31, 2022, 10:57:52 AMDoes anyone think the OP is serious?Probably no. But if OP fail to answer serious question, people who don't know about his history would question how serious/capable he is.Or he just randomly posting things trying to build post count, get some merits (which he got), and is planing some form of scam.Lets not forget according to him he already built a trading platform: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410474Either way, he is either a troll, a scammer, or someone who refuses to learn since he keeps going in loops about things.-Dave

comments.author: chibbit
comments.body: I am a fullstack blockchain developer. I am interested in your post.Please ping me via telegram if you are okay. @chibbitThank you.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on August 31, 2022, 11:15:35 AMQuote from: Lucius on August 31, 2022, 10:57:52 AMDoes anyone think the OP is serious?Probably no. But if OP fail to answer serious question, people who don't know about his history would question how serious/capable he is.You are right, even if we want to find a way to help OP with the project he keep asking for help but he doesn't tell what does he really need from us. I don't see how this will help the traders, a site with a P2P exchange is not a block explorer, that's an exchange, so, it's confusing. I feel like the main idea isn't clear at all.OP, if you really need help, just be clear in what you need, but don't expect to get people to work for free.

comments.author: Hodoor
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 30, 2022, 11:10:04 PMOnce you help me, I will give a good reward in exchange of your works. You won't be unhappy because I am a Digital Monk. You will get a surPrize when you will know me. Why do i feel like you have no intention in paying the people you're going to hire at all.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: You have to first learn to walk before you run.You should continue learning the basics of Bitcoin and increase your understanding to learn the difference between things like a block explorer and an exchange. Then you can start by contributing to existing projects instead of trying to create something yourself, specially if you don't have the necessary skills to do so.And I'm giving you the benefit of the doubt here that this whole thing wasn't a shady scheme all along.

comments.author: DigitalMonk
comments.body: I am an extremely busy person, doing other things beside Bitcoin. So I am looking for some one or a group of 3 or 4 people who can help me out to build a New Block Explorer Platform and I will provide full instructions with few new profiles that needed to be implemented. As some of you have mentioned, that I do not want to spend money for it, that is incorrect. I will pay a good amounts of money but I need to discuss the matter with them who can help me to build it. I am not a troll. Nor I am a kid.Â  I am an experienced Digitsl Monk. I do not have too much free times to collect codes from gitbub and do it myself. This is why I have placed this thread in the forum to find few people who can help me. It is not just an ordinary Block Explorer but it will consist with many other features and transaction mechanism that will be within the New Bitcoin Block Ecplorer. So please contact me if you can help.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 02, 2022, 02:04:29 PMI am not a troll. Nor I am a kid.Â  By the looks of it, you're most likely both.Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 02, 2022, 02:04:29 PMI am an experienced Digitsl Monk. This is very hard to believe. Exhibit #1:Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 02, 2022, 03:01:27 PMWhen you generate a new BTC address it automatically generate a private key and store it in the local blockchain private key dataxtorage. If you connect your computer you cannot be sure that if a pink back spy wares is present in your computer it will ultimately Transport to the hacker. Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 02, 2022, 02:04:29 PMI do not have too much free times to collect codes from gitbub and do it myself. Not to mention a lack of basic understanding of the Bitcoin or blockchain technology, or any expertise whatsoever. I can't even imagine the demands you would make of a developer who would be crazy enough to work with you.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on August 31, 2022, 10:57:52 AMDoes anyone think the OP is serious? Just ten days ago he was asking questions like this - and today he wants some kind of magical Bitcoin explorer  What's next? Designing digital good fairies to fly around handing out free Bitcoins to people?OP is trolling all LOLHe actually needs a wordpress site and keep posting blog about how to troll bitcoin community. Make it a course and sell it to others to make some money. He started with zero knowledge of bitcoin, then the offshore company and now again showing he has zero knowledge of even knowing what a block-explorer is for? ðŸ¤£Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 02, 2022, 02:04:29 PMI am an extremely busy person, doing other things beside Bitcoin. So I am looking for some one or a group of 3 or 4 people who can help me out to build a New Block Explorer Platform and I will provide full instructions with few new profiles that needed to be implemented. Can you sign a bitcoin address which have 5 BTC in it to know you are able to pay for the work?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on August 31, 2022, 12:05:54 PMQuote from: ETFbitcoin on August 31, 2022, 11:15:35 AMQuote from: Lucius on August 31, 2022, 10:57:52 AMDoes anyone think the OP is serious?Probably no. But if OP fail to answer serious question, people who don't know about his history would question how serious/capable he is.Or he just randomly posting things trying to build post count, get some merits (which he got), and is planing some form of scam.Lets not forget according to him he already built a trading platform: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410474Either way, he is either a troll, a scammer, or someone who refuses to learn since he keeps going in loops about things.-DaveDo you want to say that this charity story may not have reality? https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410466.0Â  He wants to create a trading platform, charity trusted platform, bitcoin explorer... he seems like much more and much worse than a simple troll.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: I think there are too many bitcoin explorers already to be standing out, you would need a whole range of new features other doesnâ€™t have.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 02, 2022, 02:04:29 PMI am an extremely busy person, doing other things beside Bitcoin. So I am looking for some one or a group of 3 or 4 people who can help me out to build a New Block Explorer Platform and I will provide full instructions with few new profiles that needed to be implemented. As some of you have mentioned, that I do not want to spend money for it, that is incorrect. I will pay a good amounts of money but I need to discuss the matter with them who can help me to build it. I am not a troll. Nor I am a kid.Â  I am an experienced Digitsl Monk. I do not have too much free times to collect codes from gitbub and do it myself. This is why I have placed this thread in the forum to find few people who can help me. It is not just an ordinary Block Explorer but it will consist with many other features and transaction mechanism that will be within the New Bitcoin Block Ecplorer. So please contact me if you can help. If this is your first post in this forum I will believe that you mean well and you are serious about what you're offering but I have seen some of your posts and I have a second thoughts about your motives and your way of thinking, you claim to be theÂ  QuoteFirst Official Bitcoin Ambassador and you also offer A Job for Life: Bitcoin Ambassador - Salary: US $160,000 Dollars this do not sit well with the community, people here cannot take someone like you seriously, there's also a flag created for you and its not good if that flag has a lot of support.
